meanings.definition: A large piece of cloth or similar material that is hung at the back of a stage as a background.
meanings.sent1: During the play, the actors stood in front of the backcloths.
meanings.sent2: The theater crew carefully ironed the backcloths before the show.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten tried to climb the backcloths during the performance.
meanings.sent4: The backcloths transformed the stage into a mystical forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the backcloths brought the set to life.

meanings.definition: A cloth or similar material used to cover the back of a piece of furniture.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's antique sofa was protected by a beautiful backcloths.
meanings.sent2: The backcloths on the chair added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy hid behind the backcloths to surprise its owner.
meanings.sent4: The backcloths on the couch were like a shield against spills and stains.
meanings.sent5: The soft backcloths made the chair more comfortable to sit on.
